sentences.en: About the negative responses of the Rome officials he was coarsely scornful.
sentences.cn: 他对罗马的官员那种消极的反应表示露骨的藐视.

sentences.en: And with a scornful sigh he shifted his attitude again.
sentences.cn: 他鄙薄地叹了一口气,又变换了姿势.

sentences.en: He felt humiliated by her scornful remarks.
sentences.cn: 他听到她那些嘲讽的话而感到屈辱.

sentences.en: He is deeply scornful of politicians.
He opened the door with a scornful look on his face.
He stood there looking both handsome and brave and he made his face scornful.
sentences.cn: 他站在那里显出既漂亮又勇敢的样子,脸上还摆出一副瞧不起人的神气.

sentences.en: He took a scornful glance at me when he left my room.
sentences.cn: 当他离开我的房间时,他轻蔑的看了我一眼.
她那苍白, 轻藐的嘴嫣然一笑.

sentences.en: His voice was scornful in the extreme.
sentences.cn: 他的声音听起来极端地轻蔑.

sentences.en: Scornful dogs will eat dirty puddings.
sentences.cn: 傲狗总有一天要吃脏布丁.

sentences.en: She flung him a scornful look.

sentences.en: She resented KO Chung - mou's scornful tone, and his implication that she was a frail, timid creature.
